page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.......
page.content: I MEET MY FRIENDS AND WE WALK TO SCHOOL WHERE WE GO STRAIGHT INTO THE PLAYGROUND.AT 9'O CLOCK WE LINE UP AND COME INTO SCHOOL.SOME DAYS WE HAVE ASSEMBLY BUT ON OTHERS WE DO WORK STRAIGHT AWAY.WE HAVE A BREAK IN THE MORNING.THEN WE DO SOME MORE WRITING. AT 12'O CLOCK WE ALL LINE UP FOR DINNER.SOME OF US HAVE SANDWICHES AND OTHERS HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS IN THE CAFETERIAWHICH I HAVE. AFTER DINNER WE GO BACK TO OUR CLASSES WHERE WE DO A DIFFERENT LESSON.WE HAVE ANOTHER BREAK AND THEN AT 3.30p.m WE GO HOME.WHEN I ARRIVE HOME I GET CHANGED OUT OF MY UNIFORM AND GO OUT WITH MY FRIENDS.I COME IN AT 7.30p.m I COME IN AND WATCH TELEVISION.IGO TO BED ABOUT 9'O CLOCK AND PUT MY LIGHT OUT AT 10 TO GO TO SLEEP SO THAT I CAN GET UP FOR SCHOOL THE NEXT DAY.
